nodes.text: The Ontothon government, also known as the Ontothon Parliament, was a government formed on Ontotho in preparation for the planet's entrance into the Galactic Republic. All the regions of Ontotho agreed to unite in order to form the government, except the Fylar region. After the Battle for Ontotho, the government was exposed as corrupt and was being dealt with in Republic courts. Some Fylari agreed to create a new joint government after the incident.
